CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT( Seller_Portal_Status__c ) ="Clarification on invoicing"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Klärung zur Abrechnung",
IF(TEXT( Seller_Portal_Status__c ) ="Deal agreed"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","WOW! Angebot vereinbart, startet in Kürze",
IF(TEXT( Seller_Portal_Status__c ) ="Deal closed"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Beendet",
IF(TEXT( Seller_Portal_Status__c ) ="Deal ended"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","WOW! Angebot beendet",
IF(TEXT( Seller_Portal_Status__c ) ="Deal in execution"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","WOW! Angebot in Durchführung",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Deal proposal rejected"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","WOW! Angebot abgelehnt",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Deal sent for payment"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Auszahlung ist veranlasst",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Invitation to Deals"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","eBay WOW! Einladung",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Invoice rejected, please verify"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Rechnung abgelehnt, bitte prüfen Sie die Abrechnung",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Invoice verification in process by eBay"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Rechnung in Prüfung durch eBay",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Invoicing in process"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Abrechnung erfolgt in Kürze",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Negotiation"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","WOW! Angebot in Verhandlung",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Negotiation Amended"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","WOW! Angebot Verhandlung geändert",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="New Deal proposed to eBay"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","WOW! Angebot eingereicht",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Payment completed"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Auszahlung durchgeführt",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Payment in process"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Auszahlung erfolgt in Kürze",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Payment rejected"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Auszahlung abgelehnt, bitte konktaktieren Sie eBay",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Please agree on the proposed Deal"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Bestätigen Sie das WOW! Angebot",
IF(TEXT(Seller_Portal_Status__c) ="Please provide an invoice"&&$Profile.Name="DE - Seller Portal","Rechnung hochladen",
TEXT (Seller_Portal_Status__c))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Status
